result.execSummary:
The defendant Christina M Hart was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Neglecting a Child, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.21(1)(a).
  • Neglecting a Child, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.21(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Barron County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Must report to Probation within 48 hours.

miscConds.notes: If probation or extended supervision is allowed to expire or is revoked with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge and provide current financial information.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for any balances due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.   Attorney Fees To Be Determined.  Probation does NOT collect attorney fees.
Must testify truthfully, if summoned or ordered to do so, against the co-defendant at trial. Must comply with conditions of ICW file or Human Services. Must submit DNA sample and pay the surcharge.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: count 1 together with conditions.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Christina M Hart in court with attorney Kari Suzanne Hoel.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Hoel advises agreement is to amend Counts 3 and 4 to 948.21(1)(a) Class A Misdemeanor; State agrees; Court grants amendment of Counts 3 and 4.  Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights presented and discussed.  Guilty plea entered to Counts 3 and 4 as amended.  The Court finds plea is knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily given and finds the defendant guilty.  State relates.  Attorney Hoel relates.  Court relates and orders:

SW - 2 years Probation - Must report to Probation within 48 hours
Court costs
Must testify truthfully, if summoned or ordered to do so, against the co-defendant at trial
Must comply with conditions of ICW file or Human Services
Must submit DNA sample and pay the surcharge

COVERS 15CF107 AND 15CF108.
15CF107: Defendant Dionisio B Lopez in court with attorney John M. O'Boyle.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
3:06 Language Line called.  Interpreter #201834 Sworn.
Attorney O'Boyle relates he has Information that is not dated or signed with 4 counts on it.  Two that relate to Defendant Lopez.
State relates signed copy was filed.  Court Clerk makes copies of signed and filed Information for Attorney O'Boyle.
Attorney O'Boyle relates he has previously discussed the unsigned Information with defendant and the signed Information is the same.  Defendant waives reading of Information and pleads not guilty to both charges.
Plea Hearing set for 09-30-2015 at 2:00 p.m.
Interpreter released at 3:18.

15CF108: Defendant Christina M Hart in court with attorney Kari Suzanne Hoel. Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Hoel relates she has Information that is not dated or signed with 4 counts on it.  Two that relate to Defendant Hart.
State relates signed copy was filed.  Court Clerk makes copies of signed and filed Information for Attorney Hoel.
Attorney Hoel relates defendant waives reading of Information and enters not guilty pleas to both charges.
Plea Hearing set for 09-30-2015 at 2:00 p.m.  Plea hearing scheduled for September 30, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

15CF107: Defendant Dionisio B Lopez in court with attorney John M. O'Boyle.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 1:05: Interpreter Nick Rodriquez appears with Defendant. 1:06 Language line called. Operator ID: 4240. 
15CF108: Defendant Christina M Hart in court with attorney Kari Hoel. Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

1:09: Officer Miranda Jerdee with the St. Croix Tribal Police Dept. called, sworn and direct by State. Witness identifies both Defendants. 1:29: Cross by Attorney O'Boyle. 1:39: Cross by Attorney Hoel. State makes argument. Attorney O'Boyle makes argument. Attorney Hoel makes argument and motion to dismiss Counts 3 and 4.

Court finds probable cause and binds both cases over for trial. State files Information in both cases.

1:56: Interpreter call ended.

Both cases set for 7/28/15 at 3:00 p.m.  Arraignment scheduled for July 28, 2015 at 03:00 pm.
